heading: Discontinued use
text:
The owner or operator of a cooling tower shall notify the department within 30 days after
   removing or permanently discontinuing use of a cooling tower. Such notice shall include a statement that such cooling tower has
   been drained and sanitized in compliance with the requirements of the department of health and mental hygiene for discontinuance of
   a cooling tower.
*Sections 28-317.3 & 28-317.3.1 were added by: Local Law 77 of 2015. This law has an effective date of August 18, 2015.
*
